channel.title: Need to add shops
channel.description: can anyone tell em how to add shop's to a new area. I have just made a new home but i can't puit shop's. In other word's, i don't know how to.

item.title: Need to add shops
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

okay, what you have to do, is add an npc where you want it, then search for “wanneShop”, and then it should come up with like

 else if (NPCID == ###)
{
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop(NumberofYourShopHere);
}

just replace the NumberOfYourShopHere, with the number of your shop in the shops.cfg file.

Read full topic
